bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XL (Nos 2892-2942)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Rea J.R., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XL (Nos 2892-2942). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 56.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1972, 8°, xii-134 pp. et VIII pll.

C.R. par Bernard Boyaval, REG 88 (1975) pp. 346-347. - Daniele Foraboschi, PP 28 (1973) fasc. 151, pp. 315-316. - Paul Mertens, BibO 35 (1978) pp. 112-115. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 55 (1975) pp. 291-303 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXVIII, XXXIX, XLI et XLII). - J. Pegueroles, StPap 12 (1973) pp. 114-115. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 48 (1973) No. 96, pp. 382-389. - J. David Thomas, CR N.S., 26 (1976) pp. 110-112. - Denis van Berchem, JRS 64 (1974) pp. 243-246. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 23 (1972) pp. 294-295.
